description: This API generates a single consolidated image by combining the cover images of all selected items. It is typically used to create a unified product display image for kits or bundles.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopeee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated using partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm.

children.name: component_item_id
children.description: ID of the item that composes this kit model

children.name: component_model_id
children.description: ID of the model that composes this kit model

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.
